gameDetails.name: Starship Captains: Convention Visit Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
The Convention Visit is a promo card for Starship Captains.

It is a mission card that with three lines:

     Red: Reward - Advanced two spaces on The Cooperative track;
     Blue: Reward - Advanced two spaces on The Tincan track;
     Yellow: Reward - Advanced two spaces on The Ni'an track.


Available in the Spielbox Issue #1 - 2023 magazine.
